name: Spice Finance
intro: Liquidity routing protocol for NFT lending markets
introduce: Spice is a yield optimizer and liquidity routing protocol for NFT lending markets. It helps lenders passively deploy capital onto NFT marketplaces for effortless, best-in-class yields. Spice Finance will vastly improve the complicated and time-consuming NFT lending process by aggregating all outstanding loans and pools, developing algorithmic lending strategies on top, and delivering users simple and transparent vaults that return superior NFT lending yields.
